title: Private screening room, Barbecue grills, Ride share waiting lounge
map_address: 950 East 3rd Street near Santa Fe Ave
posting_body: ['Amazing specials - Call for details.', 'A new meaning to artistic living in DTLA', 'Aliso Apartments in downtown LA is the perfect microcosm of the city, encapsulating all the characteristics and qualities you love about Los Angeles and the Arts District.', 'Here, the incredibly dynamic lifestyle spaces include studio, 1, and 2 bedroom apartments and lofts that offer an innovative concept in luxury living.', "Amid a tempting array of vintage shops, galleries à la Hauser & Wirth, and ice cream that doesn't need an Instagram filter, you’ll find your dream home, at Aliso’s DTLA apartments.", 'Garnering both name and stature from the 400-year-old Sycamore that once graced the area, Aliso Apartments provides grand-scale luxury rooted in the edgy, expressive scene affectionately known as DTLA.', 'Creative souls will feel right at home in this unique space that not only inspires expression and creativity but also fosters the drive for exploration and truly dynamic living.', 'Get in touch with us today to schedule a private tour of our new apartments in Los Angeles and see what downtown living has to offer.', 'Call Now!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 65', 'OR Text', '65', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 564 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Wood-style plank or polish concrete flooring in the living spaces', '- Ceramic tile bath surround', '- LED lighting', '- Floating kitchen shelving*', '- Kitchen island with storage (some with waterfall edge)*', '- Polish quartz kitchen and bathroom countertops', '- USB charging outlets in bedroom', '- 2 inch faux wood blinds', '- Keyless front door entry', '- Glass top electric range', '- Electric front-loading washer and dryer', '- Framed bathroom vanity mirrors', '- Aquatherm heating and air conditioning with programmable thermostat', '- Oversized double pane tinted windows (some floor to ceiling)', '- Deep soaker style bathtubs', '- Ceramic tile or polish concrete bathroom flooring', '- Quartz countertops', 'Community Amenities', '- Dog wash and self-service grooming area', '- Recording studio lounge', '- Panoramic views of Downtown LA', '- EV charging stations (ask for details)', '- Green screen room', '- Walking distance of the hottest restaurants, bars and galleries', '- 24 hour two-story fitness center', '- Virtual Moving Concierge', '- Ample short and long term bike storage', '- Over 23,000 square feet of onsite space that will place unique eateries, retail and more right at your doorstep', '- Social lounge', '- Control access community', '- Private screening room', '- Built to California Green program standards', '- Elevated bocce ball courtyard', '- Free weights, and a TRX® training wall', '- Co-working lounge space with complimentary WiFi', '- Ride share waiting lounge', '- Rooftop deck with outdoor AV', '- Private flex conference and dining room', '- Online payments available', '- Built-in cabanas', '- Heated pool and spa', '- SHARE THE AIR: smoke-free community', '- Flex use game room and presentation stage', '- Rooftop barbeque pavilion', '- Demonstration kitchen', '- Located in the heart of the LA Arts District:', '- Barbecue grills', '- Fire lounges', '- Lush landscaping', '- Resort quality cardio and strength training equipment', '- Flex use yoga studio with Wellbeats® e-training kiosk', '- Dog park with pet watering station', '- Karaoke room', 'Pet Policy', '$250 deposit for both cats and dogs.', 'For puppies & kittens under 1 year old, an additional $250 deposit applies.', 'Pet rent: $50 monthly for dogs and $35 monthly for cats.', '(All fees, deposits and charges noted above are per pet.)', 'Contact for more details.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sunday:12:00PM-6:00PM', 'Aliso Apartments', '950 East 3rd Street, Los Angeles, CA, 90013', 'ElXrfN7NwAc']
